title: Remembering Cynthia Lennon
teaser: We revisit our 2005 interview with the first wife of Beatles icon John Lennon. She died this week in Spain at the age of 75.
contentencoded:
Cynthia Lennon, the first wife of Beatles icon John Lennon died this week in Spain. SheÂ was 75. Here & Now’s Robin Young spoke with her about her life and her relationship with the famous musician, back in 2005 when her book “John” was released. We revisit that interview.
